### Rhinoceros

_Gray-skinned bulls with single nose horns. Dwell in grasslands._

**LV** 5, **AL** N
**AC** 14, **HP** 25, **MV** near
**ATK** 2 horn +4 (1d8)

|  S  |  D  |  C  |  I  |  W  |  Ch  |
|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|:----:|
| 4 | -1 | 3 | -3 | 0 | -3 |

**Charge:** Move up to double near in straight line and make 1 horn attack. If hit, x3 damage.
